ygData.subject: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Everybody, I m new to the list! I have a general question that hasen t been answered for a few months now. I m hoping one of you might know what the heck
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Everybody,
I'm new to the list! I have a general question that hasen't been
answered for a few months now. I'm hoping one of you might know what
the heck is going on! Ok, so this is what's happening;
Whenever I zone my characters face will change!?!?! I'm thinking it
has something to do with low memory but I have about 500mb of ram.
And I'm not too keen on computers so if there is another form of
memory that could be lacking please enlighten me! This stupid problem
has coused me to quit playing for awhile. It makes me sooo mad!!!!
Sincerely,
Deidre
